thread.title: WATCH: Jose Mourinho Walks Out Of Post-Match Interview
thread.title_full: WATCH: Jose Mourinho Walks Out Of Post-Match Interview

title: WATCH: Jose Mourinho Walks Out Of Post-Match Interview
text:
WATCH: Jose Mourinho Walks Out Of Post-Match Interview Wed Feb 01 2017 22:47:44   22:47:44   
Manchester United failed to capitalise on a string of good results from last night as they fired blank against relegation battlers Hull City, prompting an angry Jose Mourinho who walked out during his post-match interview. 
United must be sick of the sight of Hull following two fixtures in the matter of a week in the EFL Cup producing contrasting results. 
Jose's charges won their home leg 2-0 but lost 2-1 in the away leg eventually claiming a spot in the final. Meanwhile, the Premier League meeting completed the set with a goalless draw. 
Chelsea, Liverpool, Arsenal and Spurs all dropped points yesterday as both Manchester clubs seek to gain ground on the top four. 
City, yet again, thrashed West Ham this time by the four goals thanks to efforts from Kevin De Bruyne, David Silva, Gabriel Jesus and Yaya Toure. 
As they extend their lead ahead of United to four points following the stalemate at Old Trafford. 
And after the game, Mourinho was less than pleased with the referee. Not only did he claim he gets harshly treating by the FA but also walked out of a post-match interview: "I don't want to speak much because I pay lots of fines." - The post match comedy whenever Jose Mourinho does not win #MUNHUL pic.twitter.com/AcGYGOoCrB - Andrew Jerell Jones (@sluggahjells) February 1, 2017 
Is Jose right? Or is he just being salty? 
Sound off in the comments section below. Sponsored Links
